room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: Seriously the best escape room experience we've ever had! The Inheritance room was so creative and mind-blowing. Game Master Daniel was an awesome host and made a great product even better!

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We had so much fun here tonight! My mom, stepbrother, cousin, friend, and I all did the Inheritance game and escaped! We loved getting to interact and work together to solve the puzzles. We definitely will have to come back!

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: It was an awesome experience. We booked the entire room for the Inheritance experience and loved every minute of it. We are proud to say that we were able to escape with 3:19 remaining on the clock.

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We had a group of 8, and I think that was too many. Next time we will take fewer people. We were in the Inheritance room and found it to be very challenging, but, so much fun. Would definitely love to try another room sometime. If you've never done one, I would highly recommend it. We didn't escape, but, what a wonderful memory we made.

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: So much fun! We did the "Inheritance" room and escaped with 4 min to spare. Highly recommend this place.
